channel.title: Hugo on ReFarmer.Net :: Developer Version
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on ReFarmer.Net :: Developer Version

item.title: Deleting Content
item.description: The “Blogdown” package to RStudio provides a nice easy UI (i.e. its “Addins”" menu) to push content thru Hugo to the web (via Github and Netlify)… But it has no affordance for the deletion of posts; for this you must go into the Hugo filesystem… Not so easy as i had hoped, alas, but doable. Here’s how: In RStudio’s file browswer, navigate to /content/post/ , tick box of content item(s) you want gone, and click Delete.
